code_repairing_1:
There are many ways to improve your writing skills and sound more educated and intelligent. Here are some suggestions:

1. Read regularly: Reading widely and frequently will help you develop a better understanding of language and style, and expose you to a variety of writing techniques used by different authors.
2. Write daily: Writing regularly, even if it's just for 15-30 minutes, can help you hone your writing skills and develop a more effective writing style. It can also help you become more comfortable with the act of writing, which can in turn make you a better writer.
3. Practice writing essays: Writing essays is a great way to improve
